Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: We currently do have 2 advisors, both very experienced in their respective fields and both working for the large public companies.  First is Craig Robertson, who is Head of US Product and Listed Derivatives at Societe Generale ($30B market cap). Craig is advising us on trading and trading technology. Craig has over a decade of experience in quantitative high-frequency trading. Before Societe Generale Craig worked for such marquee names as Nomura and Barclays and has managed a quantitative hedge fund.   Our second advisor is Marina Chernyshevich, who specializes in computational linguistics and works as a Principal Linguist Developer for IHS Markit ($20B market cap) - one of the largest global information providers for the financial markets. Marina advises us on natural language processing (NLP) and sentiment analysis.  Given the strength and experience of our team and the current advisors, we are very well covered from the development and the product side. We are considering, however, adding very strong and experienced advisors on product marketing and blockchain technology to complement our skillset

Author: linhbabalala101
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: So how does this work? You go to your site to trade something, and your site automatically uses various exchanges to get the best rate?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: It's a bit more sophisticated and useful than that  :   You go to our site, you connect and fund your exchange accounts. Then you basically have 3 options:  1) Choose 1 or more of our fully-automated strategies that'd make money in your accounts. Our strategies are market-neutral, meaning they work regardless of the market direction. They rely on different types of arbitrage (statistical, price, time/latency)  2) Execute your own orders using our intelligent execution algorithms - they aim to execute orders by providing passive liquidity (akin to market-making) - that'd not only give you the best price, but save you half a spread and the taker fee (and might even earn you a maker rebate on some exchanges)  3) Choose to trade on our signals (based on market data, news and sentiment or on-chain activity analysis). You could trade them manually, semi-automatically - we'd open positions for you and you'll manage them manually or in a fully-automated mode

Author: joblessminer
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: How much does it cost to use it?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: The prices are not set yet, but I can try and give you the ballpark numbers.  It depends on the level of the platform:  If you'd want to just use our signals you'd be paying an equivalent of something around $50-200 in our TTO tokens per month  If you'd want to utilize our intelligent execution algorithms and/or semi-automated trading strategies - you are looking at smth like $200-1000 per month  Access to our fully-automated market-neutral strategies could cost a lot, lot more. + there will be staking competition for the limited number of access spots, where the balance of supply and demand would determine the amount. If our strategies turn out to be providing stable profit stream, uncorrelated to the market and without significant drawdowns (which we are absolutely sure they will) - then the sky is the limit

Author: deeltje
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: Do you believe CRYPTTO will have a lasting effect on the industry? If so, in what ways?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: We do not really have grand plans to change the industry or conquer the world for that matter, what we are doing is creating a platform that will provide enormous value to its users by giving them a clear edge over the other market participants now and maintaining that edge for many years to come.  We focus on what we know and do best rather than trying to tame the unknown. This approach might be underappreciated at the moment, but in the long run, it will serve extremely well. In the end, the real winners of the Gold Rush were the sellers of shovels and jeans, not the gold diggers

Body: We do not have a bounty program at the moment.  We have an ongoing airdrop quiz program - please, see details on our website or in our Medium blog.  We also plan a number of marketing activities mostly tied to the actual development of our platform. Thus, in the coming days we will be releasing a free API that will enable crypto traders to receive real-time normalized market data feed from all major exchanges. There are very few comparable products on the market and they all cost $1,000+ per user per month. Our API will be completely free!

Author: bojoketikung
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: That's relatively straightforward: we are charging for the access to our platform - that's our key source of revenue.  As to its potential magnitude -  just a couple of reference points for you to consider:  1) One closed Discord group providing trading "signals" has 35,000 monthly paying customers at $49 per customer. The content of the group covers maybe 50% of CRYPTTO platform's basic level value proposition  2) A provider of several basic trading algorithms, launched recently, has gathered over 10,000 paying customers just in 1 month of operation with marketing efforts mainly aimed at just 1 country. The algorithms they provide are very basic - out top platform level (fully automated trading) will have a several times better value proposition and will be marketed globally

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: The program is planned after the airdrop campaign ends

Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: In a few words how would you describe your project to an investor?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: We are gonna give you several proven fully-automated crypto trading strategies that make money independent of the market direction in a couple of months from now We'll add to that intelligent execution algorithms that'll dramatically lower your cost of trading around the same time We'll keep adding fully-automated strategies to the platform + we'd add signals for semi-automated (grey box) and manual trading We'll start with strategies and signals sourced from statistical analysis of the market data, and expand into sentiment / NLP based signals and on-chain activity analysis We will deliver, and our product will work and will be fast and reliable since we've been successfully doing exactly that in traditional markets for over 10 years already

Body: Does CRYPTTO have any major competitors? If so, how does your project differ?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: Unfortunately, patent protection does not apply to trading algorithms. The only possible protection in this sphere is trade secrets. That's the main reason why the field is so secretive - lifetime non-compete agreements are frequent, LinkedIn profiles - rare and even prohibited in many firms. Zero interviews and CNBC appearances, etc. Frankly, if not for the Flash Boys book and the largest player in the field (Virtu) going public and filing disclosures - very few people would have been actually aware of the existence of this whole industry

Author: glasbren
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: At the first glance I feel like  I should be standing up here, while any other people getting hurt as the day passing . The project should be working really well when there are more people involved in this.

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: In fact, we are yet to see a direct competitor in the crypto space. There are several categories of companies/ products that compete with us on some features, but none that we know of that combines proven proprietary trading signals, algos, and strategies with low-latency multi-exchange execution platform in a way that we do.  There are several projects that develop execution platforms, but most of them have only basic signals/alerts (if any) derived from market data analysis  There are several platforms that focus on providing trading signals of some sort, but they are either highly specialized (i.e. Twitter feed sentiment analysis only) or, on the contrary, rely mostly on crowdsourced and very basic signals. Very few of them plan execution platforms of any type  There also are several companies that basically create research tools for people to come up with their own strategies  The majority of the most-hyped names in this space, in truth, lack market experience, and pedigree to deliver a platform that will be future-proof and will withstand the test of exponentially rising competition in profitable trades  The immaturity of this market and lack of professional competition is very well illustrated by the fact that there seem to be zero professional market data providers - and without full, reliable and detailed market data there can be no serious signals/algos/strategies developed. We've started recording our own market data back in January because we could not find any suitable providers. I'm yet to see a crypto "signals" company that is even talking about this problem, let alone solving it

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: The final result here is to try to determine whether a market has an opinion on a topic/coin and if so is it positive or negative. There are two primary elements that make up this process: 1) Opinion evaluation: A natural language processing algorithm is trained to read and determine sentiment on individual social media posts. It generally returns something like a numeric value for example a score ranging  from -5 - 5 where -5 is very negative and 5 is very positive. 2) Determining what the consensus view is. This involves analyzing a significant number of posts over a defined period of time and trying to determine what the general agreement is from those samples/entries. This step is where spam filtering comes in. There are various ways to approach the spam problem but the simplest set  is a) Looking for repeated comment /identical comments b) Identifying spam sources by their previous activity (there are ways to profile this) c) Most importantly, ideally the consensus (majority) view will outweigh the spam entries if the data is properly aggregated.  Please, let me know if this answers your question; we are happy to elaborate.

Meet Cryptto: the only crypto app you need.  - Trade on any exchange you have an account on;  - Automatically track your entire portfolio;  - Check market prices, read the news, set up alerts. Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: What we are developing is, indeed, not a dapp. Rather, we are providing a missing piece of infrastructure for the crypto/dapp space. We are closely monitoring the dapp space, i.e. fog computing networks, AI and ML projects, decentralized exchanges. We have future plans for their integration - it's just very early days now and the most efficient means for providing our value proposition at the moment is a relatively centralized platform.

We do, in fact, consider a potential airdrop campaign that we want to design in a way that will allow us to build a dedicated community of crypto traders around our platform. We are not ready to announce anything just yet. You might want to join our Telegram group - that's where the announcement will be made first. https://t.me/cryptto_chat

Author: GoBelle
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: So how does this work? You go to your site to trade something, and your site automatically uses various exchanges to get the best rate?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: There actually will be three different platform levels:  If you are subscribed to the basic or pico platform level, you get a range of different trading signals based either on statistical analysis of market data, sentiment analysis of social media and social media-like channels (Twitter, Reddit, Telegram, Bitcointalk), news analysis (using natural language processing techniques) and on-chain data analysis (i.e. large wallets movements). You can set up different alert types for the signals of your choice.  Access to femto platform level allows you to automatically open positions on major exchanges in response to the signals of your choice. This allows you to profitably trade a much broader set of strategies and minimize price slippage (the difference between the signal/suggested strategy price and the actual execution price). Position management/ risk management remains the responsibility of the platform user in this case  Finally, limited access to the atto platform level will allow users to execute fully automated trading strategies within the user-specified parameters. Position opening, sizing/risk management, and closing are fully automated. It gives users access to strategies and scale simply not feasible with any different setup. We expect that this platform level will be mostly utilized by institutional traders  All our signals and strategies are vetted by us, extensively back-tested and out-of-sample validated  I hope this helps

Author: Motookerva
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: I gotta admit, a lot of those sound potentially very useful even to an amateur investor like me. Are they still in development, or complete?

Author: idioma1
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: Could you clarify for me the idea?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: The platform is intended to be useful for a wide range of crypto traders/investors - from amateur to experienced professionals. You gotta have some trading experience to get the best out of the platform, though, so not for the complete beginners.  Re: the platform development - major parts of it are, in fact, already operational:  - we began collecting, recording and analyzing crypto market data starting January. By now we have almost a dozen exchanges connected. So far we have not found a provider of crypto market data that gives us exactly what we need (and used to in traditional markets) - thus we have to rely on ourselves  - once we've collected a reasonable amount of market data, we've started to extract signals from it. Extracting and back-testing signals and strategies - that's the most difficult part, that's where a lion's share of effort and know-how lies, but you gotta understand that we do not have to build everything from scratch - we've been developing and perfecting the platform that does exactly that in traditional markets for over a decade. Now we have to adjust it somewhat to crypto markets - but that's just a fraction of the effort  - we are in the late innings of adjusting our execution platform to crypto as well  - what we do have to develop from scratch - is the front-end and UI, since our platform initially was built for internal use only. That takes some time, but is, frankly, the easiest part

Author: davida
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: No bounty at the moment ? When you have a product that you did not advertise, it can be described as you are winking in the dark and only you knows what you are doing. Bounty will expose your project to the interested investors unless you have private investors. i will suggest that you split the team 30% into 2 and use the other part for bounty (Sorry to intrude into your business)

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: Zero intrusion here In fact, thank you for your thoughts. We completely agree that we are somewhat under the radar at the moment. That's why we are planning on the airdrop campaign that we'll announce quite soon - in fact, in the coming days. It won't be a traditional "register and get your tokens" kind of an aidrop though. Rather, you'll have to take a fun an educative quiz (at least we hope it's both those things) on crypto trading.  The reason we chose to go this way is that we want to build a community of people truly interested in crypto trading and the value that our platform can provide.  Bounty campaign is not out of the picture either - we might launch it sometime after the aidrop campaign ends.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: What a great idea. I am really interested in NLP and I'm excited to see this project in action.  Does CRYPTTO have a token? If so, what is the benefit of holding it?

Author: Maksim_H
Title: CRYPTTO - The Only Crypto App You Need
Body: Sure! Our token name is TTO and it serves as the only means of access to our platform. It is used to pay subscription fees on all platform levels, plus one would need to stake TTO in addition to paying the subscription fee to access the 2nd platform level. The number of access spots to the top platform level will be limited and there will be regular auctions held where users will compete on the amount of TTO they are prepared to stake to access it.
